Author: PassionFruitYellow
Text: My dad didn't really care when he found out. My mum was very angry. They both swept it under the rug as soon as I stopped losing weight. Parents are just normal people and most of the time have no idea how to react. I've also had people say it's a normal thing teenage girls do. Which it definitely isn't. Most people just don't know what an eating disorder truly is or how to react. I found it v distressing and upsetting when people first found out and brushed me off.
